full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### Title

Notice of Request for Proposal (RFP) for High Grass Mower

### Solicitation Number

WS4243022862

### Publication Date

October 16, 2023

### Tender Closing Date

November 2, 2023, 14:00 hours (Eastern Time)

### Tender Status

Expired

### Solicitation Summary

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a high grass mower on behalf of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC). The tender is for the acquisition of a high grass mower, including delivery to Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec. The solicitation number is WS4243022862.

### Description

The procurement is classified under the United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC) *21100000, which pertains to Agricultural and Forestry and Landscape Machinery and Equipment.

### Selection Criteria

The lowest priced proposal will be selected as the winner.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Affected Entities

- Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)
- Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)

### Contact Information

Corine Lavoie, Contract Specialist
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
PSPC
Corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17728114?extsite=MTc3MjgxMTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== (Note: Link may require login credentials)
